text: 🚨2023-2024 US Flu Season: Preliminary In-Season Burden Estimates🚨💡Did you know that the CDC provides weekly updates on flu-related hospitalizations during flu season?🤔💥Preliminary estimates are updated each week and compared to end-of-season estimates from previous seasons. 🔍🚨The number of flu hospitalizations estimated so far this season is higher than previous end-of-season estimates! 😱💪It's important to take action to prevent the spread of the flu, such as getting vaccinated and practicing good hygiene. 💉🧴👀Stay informed and stay healthy! Follow the CDC for the latest updates on the flu season. 👍#FluSeason
